comment: % of this invading army is fighting aged men. If they shield themselves with their women and children, that's on them. You didn't answer my question. The media is going to paint the worst picture imaginable regardless of what actually happens. Babies ripped from their mother's arms and Trump is a racist. You trying to cater to "live tv" only helps them and gets you no appeasement points, at all. Let me also ask you, if the border was Israeli and these were Pals, would it be different?
